indicator_name: 토지소유에 대한 여성의 평등한 권리를 보장하는 법률적 기반(관습법 포함)을 갖춘 국가의 비율
target_name: 경제적 자원, 소유권, 토지 및 기타 형태의 부동산, 상속, 천연자원, 금융서비스 등의 평등한 권리를 여성에게 보장하도록 개혁 실시

en.target: Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws
en.title: Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control
en.indicator_name: Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control

en.page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
